sentences.sContent: She sheered off in time to avoid an accident.
sentences.sCn: 轮船及时转向，避免了一次事故。

sentences.sContent: The jet was descending steeply, but its pilot was able to pull it out just in time.
sentences.sCn: 这架喷气式飞机直线下降，但飞行员及时制止了飞机的俯冲。

sentences.sContent: In order to catch the train in time, he polished off two bowls of rice in 5 minutes.
sentences.sCn: 为了及时赶上火车， 他在5分钟内就把两碗饭狼吞虎咽地吃光了。

trans.tranOther: after a period of time when a situation has changed
